translations.chinese: 漢王既至南鄭，諸將及士卒皆歌謳思東歸，多道亡還者。
translations.english: King Han having arrived at Nanzheng, the generals and soldiers all sang ballads longing to return east, and many deserted and went back by the roads.

translations.chinese: 韓信為治粟都尉，亦亡去，蕭何追還之，因薦於漢王，曰：「
translations.english: Han Xin was grain supply commander, but he also deserted. Xiao He pursued and brought him back, then recommended him to King Han, saying:

translations.chinese: 必欲爭天下，非信無可與計事者。」
translations.english: If you truly wish to contend for the world, there is no one but Xin with whom you can plan affairs."

translations.chinese: 於是漢王齊戒設壇場，拜信為大將軍，問以計策。
translations.english: So King Han purified himself and set up an altar platform, appointing Xin as grand general and asking him for strategies.

translations.chinese: 信對曰：「項羽背 約而王君王於南鄭，是遷也。
translations.english: Xin replied: "Xiang Yu broke the agreement and enfeoffed you as king in Nanzheng. This was banishment.
